mapper.insert: insert into usertbl (email, username, photoURL, nickname, slackID, joinDate, address, address2, extension, workPhone, phone, coin) values (#{email},#{username},#{photoURL},#{nickname},#{slackID},#{joinDate},#{address},#{address2},#{extension},#{workPhone},#{phone},"1000")
mapper.select: select email, username, photoURL, slackID, coin from usertbl
mapper.update: update usertbl set coin=#{coin} where email = #{email}
